item.description:
Hi Folks,

So, I feel like going for a walk around Fresh Pond, (weather permitting), maybe venting a bit about the week, laughing a bit about the week, having a bite to eat and having a Cosmo or Margarita or glass of wine, or something. Just wanna hang out ...

The plan is to walk around Fresh Pond in Cambridge and then going to Summer Shack for a bite to eat.

Wear comfortable shoes because we may walk for a few miles!

Who's in? It would be great to get a fairly large group of men and women for this event.

Meet me in the parking lot at Summer Shack.

Summer Shack's website:

http://www.summershac...

Summer Shack is located next to Alewife in Cambridge. The address got funky when I submitted it. Check out Summer Shack's website for more info.

Cheers!

Lisa
617-999-9094

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Walk Around Fresh Pond - Bite to Eat at Summer Shack - Have a Drink in Cambridge
